page.title: 16RECREATION-WINTER BRAE
page.content:
BADMINTON Badminton is the winter sport of Shetland.We have a local club"Brae Badminton Club".The club meets on a Tuesday night,juniors in the early evening,seniors later in the night. A league system does operate in winter.Our local club does not take part in the league,but some local players play for Ollaberry.Juniors take part in tournamets.
500 500 is a card game which is very popular with all age groups.Every second Monday 500 drives are held in the sailing club.The game is like Bridge.You bid and score playing in pairs.At the end of the night scores are totalled and prizes are awarded to the best lady and gent.
